# NSTrackingSeparatorToolbarItem

**Class**

A toolbar separator that aligns with the vertical split view in the same window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSTrackingSeparatorToolbarItem
```

## Overview

Use a `NSTrackingSeparatorToolbarItem` to divide an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbar] into sections that visually align with the views on either side of the divider of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTrackingSeparatorToolbarItem/splitView]. This keeps [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem]s above the content that’s the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem/target] for the item’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItem/target].

The `splitView` must be in the same window as the toolbar containing this item before showing the toolbar.

## Creating a tracking separator

- **init(identifier:splitView:dividerIndex:)**: Creates a new tracking separator toolbar item and configures it to align with the divider of the split view.

## configuring a tracking separator

- **dividerIndex**: The index of the split view divider to align with the tracking separator.
- **splitView**: The vertical split view to align with the toolbar separator.

## Items

- **NSToolbarItem**: A single item that appears in a window’s toolbar.
- **NSToolbarItemGroup**: A group of subitems in a toolbar item.
- **NSToolbarItemGroup.ControlRepresentation**
- **NSToolbarItemGroup.SelectionMode**: A value that indicates how a grouped toolbar item selects its subitems.
- **NSMenuToolbarItem**: A control that presents a menu in a window’s toolbar.
- **NSSearchToolbarItem**: A toolbar item that contains a search field optimized for performing text-based searches.
